title: BD Crypto
author: BD Crypto
content: It's really a great feelings when I was searching my transections through Bitcoin in my old Coinbase Account . And saw that I have made many transections when the Bitcoin price was around 586$ only. Yes it's only Because this Bitcoin already hit above 60k $. I am enjoying today's moment because today I have imagined my past and it was the golden era of Bitcoin. I am talking about 2016.Today I have again learnt a good lesson that Hold is Gold. I have made many transections and I had a decent amount of Bitcoins but If I could hold them then I would become one of a successful Holder. But my luck wasn't so good I think. But I still have chances because Bitcoin is now also in a very cheap price. So Always Keep Trust On Bitcoin And Hold Tightly.  At the end of time you will win surely.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: i know Bitcoin around October 2014 and the Bitcoin price at that time was around 330$. Just like you said that Hold BTC is gold because at that time i always sell the coins that i got from a faucet and never really hold it for long time.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: I got to know Bitcoin at around January 2014 and when I search back the price of BTC during those time is around $890  it was a few months after the peak of the bull run, after the Bitcoin market recorded its 2013 ATH. And on the later month, the price of BTC crashed to $300+.It is really regretful that we don't pay much attention to buying BTC at that time thinking that it was too expensive to buy and now we realized that it was too cheap back then.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Not entirely sure the price but it's probably in 3 digit figures when I came across bitcoin.But not convinced until it reaches big heights that no one ever expected to happen in that short span so my first buy is around $3000 per BTC.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Not a significant amount, it was probably in the range of $8,000 to &$9,000 at about early 2018 and I was just learning about how it hit what was then a very remarkable price of almost $20,000. I still had to do a lot of learning during the period and wade through a couple of altcoins before starting to stack up sats.The cheapest I've seen Bitcoin is a little over $3,000 as at late 2018. This just goes to put into perspective how changes in price affects the sentiment towards the market. At that time $3k was the bear period and now $30k is a bear period.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Well, i came to familiar with BTC in 2018 and spent a whole lot of time in earning it for free using my Laptop and unfortunately did not collected of even 1$ nor bought. I only focused to earn it for free while having no knowledge well that's another thing. But when i gets familiar with BTC its price was around  $4k to $4.5k. I was a student at that time and did not have any money so i talked with my cousin and asked him he was also out of money and we both thought to borrow money to buy some BTC but as we both were students and have no jobs to do which could bring money and thus we could pay the lender back so we dropped the plan. And still now we have the same feelings as before, but now we are making some money but not that much to invest in BTC. So we are still dropping the plan but i do want to collect at least 1 BTC but saying so will not make it happens so let's see what is in my luck.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: Been looking at bitcoin since 2015, back when it was just 100 bucks. I studied it and found that it had this massive upward trend ever since it was conceptualized so I figured it would be great to invest in it or to work for bitcoin basically. So I registered on this site soon as I realized this forum exists, and from then on bitcoin has been my biggest financial weapon, that allowed me to reach financial freedom. I've known people over the internet that have been investing or observing bitcoin as early as 2010-2012, which I must say is the glory days considering how much cheaper you could buy bitcoin during those times and how massive the turnouts would be had I invested on it. Congratulations OP, most of us here actually have been in the same boat as you, it's all about timing, but since you're still in bitcoin you'd have all the chances in the world to invest and reap profits eventually.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: I saw it first in 2013 when it was $100-150, but I got involved after the 2013 bull market when it begun to crash down from 1k. There were many different times and prices when I bought bitcoin. I don't remember what my first ever transaction was, but it had to be somewhere between $400 and $600 in 2014. I remember that I kept buying throughout the year and I also got into some signature campaigns when bitcoin was cheap and kept the earned coins. Keep holding guys, bitcoin is the real sound money. When you get to a point at which inflation costs you $50k a year, you start looking for alternatives.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: I fully participated in bitcoin at the year 2022 May although I registered in the month of April. And fully participate in the month of May 2022. And at that time bitcoin was at the range of $41 to _42k. And late the following the month the price of BTC just came down very well till now. So  I am hoping to see another great price of bitcoin towards this year ending. Though every year has it own way of the price analysis buy I believe this year end there bull sign of the digital. Currency.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well I can't remember the price of Bitcoin when I saw it infact I was not even paying attention to the price of Bitcoin when I was at the early stages of getting acquitted with it, well a big thumbs up to the person that introduced me to crypto-currency, I wasn't taught that Bitcoin was going to make me so rich, I was taught about the potentials of Bitcoin and how it would be a recognized currency in the future.I think we have become to carried away by the price that we are losing touch with the real value and purpose of Bitcoin, I think there are many other fast investment opportunities if that's anyone's main Aim.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I think the price was around 20k when I got in, I really can’t remember but it was still more than I could afford at the time so I bought some fractions of bitcoin and it was a gratifying experience to finally own some bitcoins. Quote from: BD Crypto on May 27, 2023, 07:24:54 PMToday I have again learnt a good lesson that Hold is Gold. I have made many transections and I had a decent amount of Bitcoins but If I could hold them then I would become one of a successful Holder. But my luck wasn't so good I think. But I still have chances because Bitcoin is now also in a very cheap price. So Always Keep Trust On Bitcoin And Hold Tightly.  At the end of time you will win surely.We can all choose to wallow in regret, in my case I could beat myself about why I didn’t buy bitcoin back when it was less than $100. Don’t be so hard on yourself. Not everyone can hodl their bitcoins for so long, at least you made your profits and still have some bitcoin left.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Bitcoin was worth approximately $200 during my first interaction with it, somewhere between 2013 and 2014. Unfortunately, I wanted to purchase it but didn't have the means to do so. However, I at least tried to remain active in the cryptocurrency scene by browsing the forum and using faucets to accumulate a small fraction of Bitcoin, which was later worth a few hundred dollars. Those were great times that we'll never see again, but overall, it has been a great journey, acquiring stunning experiences throughout the years.Personally, I don't regret anything. Holding is great and all, but at some point we will all end up selling our coins; it's an inevitable process. I have several old transactions that would now be worth a fortune, but I'm not bothered by them; I couldn't have known better at the time.

comments.author: Lanatsa
comments.body: On the time that I had first awareness about Bitcoin or learn with it is on the time that it does still have that $100 per coin or btc on which accumulating on this days is really that simpleEven with just signature campaign on which I do remember that they do give out 0.04 or more per weekly on which it is really that easy to accumulate a whole coin on that time.Regrettable  part is that I do really make out active cash outs and conversions  on which it do cause out for me to be able to actively spending my coins and I wasn't able to accumulate even a single coin because I'm really that in need of money in part of my weekly needs which I would need to cash out those things but well this isn't something that we could really turn back in time.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: BD Crypto on May 27, 2023, 07:24:54 PMIt's really a great feelings when I was searching my transections through Bitcoin in my old Coinbase Account . And saw that I have made many transections when the Bitcoin price was around 586$ only. Yes it's only Because this Bitcoin already hit above 60k $. I am enjoying today's moment because today I have imagined my past and it was the golden era of Bitcoin. I am talking about 2016.When first heard about bitcoin was when bitcoin pumped to around $20k and dump to around $3k, actually I was being told and I haven't joined crypto space by then, but I started investing in bitcoin when the price was around $10k, and have been accumulating bitcoin with any extra amount am having, and I will continue to accumulate more bitcoin. Some people started investing in bitcoin when the price was still very low, but some people started investing recently, but the fact is that whenever you are opportuned to invest in bitcoin, then don't be discouraged that the price is already high. When bitcoin price got to $10k, most people tough that the price was too high and they didn't invest but we all saw bitcoin all time high, so don't think it's late to invest in bitcoin.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I took a step back to check how much transactions i have done with Bitcoin and fo a significant level, i have done close to 1 unit of bitcoin even though it has not been too long coming into bitcoin, bur i first hard about bitcoin in the year 2o13 and at that time Bitcoin was too hard for me to understand the concept until recently.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: I am new to bitcoin investment because I don't have much knowledge on bitcoin. I have known of bitcoin since 2020,when I some of my friends were into it but I wasn't that interested because I don't have much as extra cash which I can risk to invest in bitcoin. At that time the price was between $8,600 to $9k range. I joined this forum early this year to learn and grow on my bitcoin journey. So if you ask me about the price,I will say 19k when I bought my first bitcoin. Those early investors are the ones that bought bitcoin very cheap since they believed in it earlier. Those investors that hold on to their bitcoin from that time till now must be proud and happy for their patience and knowledge on holding for long. Holding and accumulating for a very long time is the best strategy for your bitcoin journey.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I first became acquainted with Bitcoin when its price was around $700, although I cannot precisely recall the exact year, it was likely in 2016 or 2017. Unfortunately, at that time, I didn't recognize the potential of Bitcoin and missed the opportunity to accumulate it. However, my perspective shifted when the price surpassed $3,000, prompting me to start accumulating Bitcoin and engaging in trading activities. As of now, I possess a substantial amount of Bitcoin. Since I enjoy capitalizing on its volatility, I don't hold Bitcoin permanently, preferring to actively trade and leverage its price fluctuations to make money.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: darkangel11 on May 27, 2023, 08:28:39 PMI saw it first in 2013 when it was $100-150, but I got involved after the 2013 bull market when it begun to crash down from 1k. There were many different times and prices when I bought bitcoin. I don't remember what my first ever transaction was, but it had to be somewhere between $400 and $600 in 2014. I remember that I kept buying throughout the year and I also got into some signature campaigns when bitcoin was cheap and kept the earned coins. Keep holding guys, bitcoin is the real sound money. When you get to a point at which inflation costs you $50k a year, you start looking for alternatives. ^BTC price did not reach $1k beyond 2016, it is in 2017.In 2015 the first I heard BTC price it was $200-$300 but I don't have interest much at that time because I thought it was a scam until such day after a year in 2016 I found this forum and that is the reason I understand very well how BTC work. Imagine, from $200 to $26k at this moment or the previous ATH was in $60k, investing and accumulating that time would be I will sit like a king right now and have financial free.
